resources.string: Unechokwadi here kuti unoda kunyerenyesa hurukuro dzese kusvika pane tsamba %s dza iyezvino?

Yambiro, izvi zvinoremadza kukwedekerwa kwepfimbi patsamba dzese ne svombonoro. Kukwedekerwa kwezvikamu zvako kucharamba kuchiita, asi chero ani anowana hupindwa mumuchina wako achakwanisa kuzviverenga.
Bata kuti ushandure hurongwa hwe apu yetsamba
Bata kuti SMSSecure igadzire hurongwa hwe tsamba pfupi yako
Kushaikwa kwe apu inokwanisa kusarudza midhiya nayo.
Unoda kuwona nyepfenyuro iyi inetsivatsaona here?

Parizvino midhiya iyi yakachengetedzwa mupfimbi redhata rakakwedekerwa. Kuti ukwanise kuiona nechioneso chechiremu chekunze zvinofanira kuti dhata rimbomira kukwedekerwa kwenguva pfupi uye rinyorwe pa dhisiki. Unechokwadi chekuti unoda kuita izvi?
Tagamuchira svumbunuro yekutsinha tsamba, baya kuti zvishishwe.
Tsamba iyi <b>haikwanisi<b> kukwedekerwa nekuda kwekuti sesheni ine tsivatsaona haina kukwanisa kutangwa.\n\nTotumira tsamba isina tsivatsaona here?
Pashaikwa apu inokwanisa kuvhura butiro remidhiya.
Tagamuchira tsamba kubva kune munhu ane SMSSecure, totanga chikamu chakakwedekera here?
Unechokwadi kuti unoda kuvhara sesheni yakakwedekera here?
Unechokwadi kuti unoda kudzima hutaurwa huno uyu zvachose here?
Tine urombo, paita kanganiso pakugadzira batanidzwa rako.
Tine urombo, vhidhiyo yasarudzwa inodarika hukuru hwetsamba inobvumirwa (%1$skB).
Tine urombo, butiro remazwi rawasarudza rinodarika hukuru hwetsamba inobvumirwa (%1$skB).
Mugamuchiri haana kero yetsamba pfupi kana tsambambozha inoshanda!
Muchina uyu hauwoneke uchitsigira sarudzo yekuchaya.
Zvikamu zvakakwedekera zvinokwanisa kutangwa nevamwe vanhu.
Tsamba iyi haikwanise kutumirwa nekuti mutakuri haatsigire tsamba dzine midhiya.
Unechokwadi here kuti unoda kudzima tsamba dzese dzawasarudza
Kuchengetedza batanidzo iri mupfimbi kunoita kuti mamwe ma apu ari parunhare mbozha akwanise kuita hupindwa pariri.\n\nToenderera here?
Pane chakanganisa kuchengetedza batanidzo iyi mupfimbi!
Unechokwadi here kuti unoda kudzima shinda dzehutaurwa dzasarudzwa idzi?
Yambiro, izvi zvichaita kuti zviri mukati me bomhoremavara retsamba dzako dze SMSSecure zviexupotwe ku SD kadhi.
Kanganiso, takundikana kunyorera ku SD kadhi!
Kanganiso pakati pekunyorera ku SD kadhi.
Paita kanaganiso isina kutarisirwa yatadzisa kugadzirwa kweboka.
Panodivikanwa nhengo imwe chete zvayo muboka!

Izvi zvicha imupota tsamba kubva mugumbapamwe ragara riripo retsamba pfupi ku pfimbi yedhata kuenda ku SMSSecure. Kana uchinge wagamuchira gumbapamwe retsamba pfupi ye pfimbi yedhata, kuimupota zvakare kunozokonzeresa kudzokorodzwa kwetsamba.

Kudzoreredza bhekiapu yakakwedekerwa uku kuchaita kuti svumbunuro, zvido netsamba dziripo kuti dzidzorerwe. Ucharasa mashoko arimu chivakirirwa cheSMSSecure chiripo parizvino asi kwete ari mu bhekiapu.
Izvi zvicha imupota tsamba kubva mubhekiapu rebomhoremavara. Kana wanga wambo imupota bhekiapu iyi, kuimupota zvakare kunozokonzeresa kudzokorodzwa kwetsamba.
Tiri ku imupota bhekiapu re bomhoremavara...
SMSSecure inoda \"Barcode scanner\" kuitira murau we QR.
Paita kanganiso pakupfimbika tsamba ine midhiya iyi!
Paita kanganiso pakuhaka muyananisi wetsamba dzine midhiya...
Paita kanganiso pakukuverenga gadziro yetsamba dzine midhiya dzemuyananisi asina waya...
Wagamuchira tsamba yakakwedekerwa pachashandiswa SMSSecure yakare isingachatsigirwe. Kumbira mutumiri kuti akwidze kusvika pavhezheni raikezvino wotumira tsamba zvakare.

Chitambi chiri pasvumbunuro yekutsinha yakasiyana pane zvawambogamuchira kubva kumubati uno. Izvi zvinogona kureva kuti panemumwe munhu arikuedza kuganhura kutaurirana kwenyu, kana kuti mubati uyu akavakirira SMSSecure zvekare uye ikezvino ava nechitupa chitsva chesvumbunuro.
Chitambi chiripasvumbunuro yekutsinha iyi chinovimbika, asi gadziro resvumbunuro yakazara yekutsinhira rinozviitira rega ratadziswa.
Unofanira kuwona kururama kwechitupa chemubati uyu.
Hauchakwanise kuwona tsamba dzino tumirwa nemushandisi uyu.
Unechokwadi here kuti unoda kubvisa dziviro pazita iri?
Tagamuchira svumbunuro yekutsinha tsamba yevhezheni isingachashande.
Tagamuchira tsamba ine svumbunuro inechitupa chisingazivikanwe. Baya kuti zvipinde mushishi nekuzotaridza zviripo.
Tatambira mashoko echitupa akaziviswa asi asingazivikanwe. Bata kuti uwone kuti chitupa chakavimbika.
YAMBIRO, svumbunuro yaferefetwa iyi HAISI kuenderana nezviripo! Tinokumbirisa kuti utarise zvidhindo izvi zvine ungwaru.
Svumbunuro iyi ndeyechokwadi. Unodikanwawo kuti uwongorore kururama kwesvumbunuro yako navo.
YAMBIRO, svumbunuro yaferefetwa iyi HAISI kuenderana nezviripo!
Watumidzira chikumbiro chekutanga chikamu kumugamuchiri uyu, unechokwadi chekuti unoda kutumidzira imwe here? Kuita izvi zvichashayisa basa chikumbiro chekutanga.
Paita kanganiso pakubvisa tsivatsaona patsamba iyi.
Tiri kuedza kuhakira ku\"server\" yetsamba dzemidhiya...
Bata uye gadzirisa gadziro retsamba dzemidhiya kuti uenderere mberi nekututunura.
Kubvisa kukwedekerwa patsamba yemidhiya, rukumbiro imbomira....
Bata kuti uvhure, kana kuti bata chihuri kuti uvhare.
Hapana mhinduro yakachimbidzika kana SMSSecure yakavharwa!
Tatadza kutora bhuku kubva pamuchina wako. Asi unogona kushandisa ADB kuti ukwanise kubvisa zvipfukuto.
Unoda kuimupota tsamba dzako here kuendesa kupfimbi yeSMSSecure yakakwedekera?
Gumbapamwe yepfimbi redhata harizoshandurwa kana kuchinjwa kana nenzira ipi zvayo.
Zvinokwanisa kutora kanguva. Tichakuzivisa kana kuimuporta kwazadziswa
Exupota bhekiapu rebutiro re bomhoremavara rinopindirana ne bhekiapu yetsamba pfupi nekudzoreredza kuenda ku SD kadhi.
Imupota gumbapamwe yepfimbi redhata retsamba pfupi
Imupota pfimbi yedhata kubva kugumbapamwe ragara riripo retsamba.
Imupota bhekiapu rebutiro re bomhoremavara. Rinopindirana ne bhekiapu yetsamba pfupi nekudzoreredza.
SMSSecure inoda gadziro yetsamba dze midhiya kuti isvitse tsamba dze midhiya nedze muboka kuburikidza nemutakuri wepasina waya. Muchina wako hautaridzi mashoko aya...

Kuti utumire midhiya netsamba dzeboka, baya ‘hongu’ uye zadzikisa gadziro dzakumbirwa. Gadziro dzetsamba dzemidhiya pamutakuri anowanza kuwanikwa kupfurikidza nekutsvaga ‘APN yemutakuri wako.’ Uchada kuti izviite izvi kamwechete.
Shandisa SMSSecure kuti uwone nekuchengetedza tsamba dzese dzirikupinda
Shandisa SMSSecure kuti uwone nekuchengetedza tsamba dzine midhiya dzese dzirikupinda
Gonesa sarudzo iyi kana kiibhodhi yako ichitsigira ma \"emojis\".
Sarudza zita rako riripo kubva pamutsara we mazita.
Pedzisa kutsinhana kwesvumbunuro kuti zvikamu zvitsva kana kuti zvikamu zvagara zviripo zvinechitupa chakafanana zviitike otomatikali.
Dzivisa mipikicha epa chivhitivhiti mumutsara wemanje ne mukati me apu
Sungira kuti izwi rekudarika ribvunzwe kuti pawane hupindwa mutsamba mushure menguva yakapihwa.
Sarudza panoperera nguva yekushanda kwe izwi rekudarika
Nguva yekumira isati yakanganwa izwi rekudarika mupfungwa
Isa gadziro yako yepeteni yekubwaira kweLED
Gadziro yako yepeteni yekubwaira kweLED yaiswa!
Ridza ruzha rwezviziviso kana uchiwona hutaurwa huri mubishi
Shandisa mukondo wegadziro wetsamba dze midhiya
Darikidza gadziro dzegumbapamwe dzetsamba dze midhiya nemashoko aripasi apa.
Kumbira kuman\'arwa kwekusvitswa kwetsamba pfupi imwe ne imwe yaunenge watumira
Ratidza chiziviso kana tsamba yatumirwa yasvika
Dzima tsamba dzakare kana shinda yehurukuro dzetsamba yadarikidza urefu hwakatarwa
Ongorora shinda dzehutaurwa dzose wobva waisa magumo ehurefu hwehutaurwa
Gadzira apu yetsamba pfupi sehurongwa hwako
Ita SMSSecure kuti ive apu yehurongwa hwetsamba pfupi/ tsamba dzine midhiya yegumbapamwe rako.
Gonesa kana muchina wako uchishandisa nepfenyuro yepasina waya kusvitsa tsamba pfupi/ tsamba dzine midhiya (gonesa chete kana \"kuchaya pasina waya\" kwakagoneswa pamuchina wako).
Taridza nguva yekutumira panzvimbo yenguva yekutambira tsamba dzirikupinda
Shandisa se apu yetsamba yamazuva ose?
Bata kuti SMSSecure ite apu yetsamba pfupi yako yamazuva ose.
Bata kuti wokopa tsamba pfupi dzerunhare rwako kuenda ku bhekiapu yakakwedekera.
Kana urikufarira kushandisa apu ino, tinokumbira kuti utore kanguva kuti utibatsire nekuisa muero wako pairi.
